settings.account.deregisterAccount.title: Deregister Account
settings.account.deregisterAccount.descr: Permanently delete your account from the platform.
settings.account.deregistration.modal.co: Deleting your account is permanent and irreversible
Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?
settings.account.deregistration.modal.do: Please review the data retention options and terms of agreement
Share your music collection anonymously for the community to access (without personal information)
Authorize anonymized data analysis to enhance platform features
settings.account.deregistration.form.war: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data. All content, including personal information and transaction history, will be erased immediately.
settings.account.deregistration.agreemen:
I understand that this operation will permanently delete the account and all associated data, including:
  • Personal information and credentials
  • Playback history and statistics
I have read and agree to the account deregistration policy and conditions and confirm that all data will be completely deleted
